response.original_title: The Sacred Place between Earth and Space
response.overview: "The Sacred Place Between Earth and Space" is a cosmic look into the Afrofuturism movement and its Saturn-dwelling pioneer, Sun Ra, with Harlem Stage's 3 day concert series starring world renowned trombonist, Craig Harris. More than a doc, This film is a love letter to Harlem. It's a celebration of Sun Ra. It's an interplanetary dance and improvisational cry for peace.
response.title: The Sacred Place between Earth and Space
